item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:

27. The evolution of nepotism in academia, 1088-1800 (74 points | 89 comments)

29. What Is a Staff Engineer? (84 points | 82 comments)
